author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Align Technology Provides Update Regarding SmileDirectClub Dispute
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Align Technology Inc:
* ALIGN TECHNOLOGY PROVIDES UPDATE REGARDING SMILEDIRECTCLUB (SDC) DISPUTE
* ALIGN TECHNOLOGY - DISPUTE DOES NOT IMPACT CO’S EXISTING SUPPLY AGREEMENT WITH SDC WHICH REMAINS IN PLACE THROUGH 2019
* ALIGN TECHNOLOGY - IN APRIL , SDC ENTITIES INITIATED PROCEEDINGS SEEKING TO PRELIMINARILY & PERMANENTLY REQUIRE CO TO CLOSE EXISTING INVISALIGN STORES
* ALIGN TECHNOLOGY INC - SDC ENTITIES INITIATED PROCEEDINGS THAT SEEK TO PRELIMINARILY AND PERMANENTLY PROHIBIT ALIGN FROM OPENING ANY ADDITIONAL STORES
* ALIGN - SDC ENTITIES SEEKING TO ALLOW IT TO HAVE A RIGHT TO REPURCHASE CO’S SDC FINANCIAL MEMBERSHIP INTERESTS FOR PRICE OF CO’S CURRENT CAPITAL ACCOUNT BALANCE
* ALIGN TECHNOLOGY INC - SDC ENTITIES SEEKING TO PRELIMINARILY AND PERMANENTLY ENJOIN ALL ACTIVITIES RELATED TO INVISALIGN STORE PILOT PROJECT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
